title: One of my friends asked for this card
author: Rich Klein

posts.post_title: One of my friends asked for this card
posts.post_content:
I am passing on his request and if you have any please feel free to email me through this board

RICH,  Looking for this card in about any condition. If you can help, let me know!

1887-90 OLD JUDGE N172 #314 TOM LOFTUS MGR

Thanks!
Rich
